product_name: GNU Velvet Guru EC2 BTX Snowboard - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Loaded with pop and stability for aggressive riders, the GNU Velvet Guru EC2 BTX Snowboard will be your go-to choice for days spent exploring the entire mountain. EC2 BTX elliptical camber features Banana Tech rocker between the bindings and elliptical camber under your feet for effortless float in powder and unmatchable pop in the park. Magne-Traction improves edge grip by adding seven contact points along the running length of the board, resulting in amazing control whether riding ice or pow. True Twin shape allows you to ride equally well in both directions. Mervin CGA.5 Aspen Columbian Gold core with sintered sidewalls offers strength, control and pop; fiberglass gives the core strength and pop. Impact-resistant end-grain internal sidewalls; UHMW sidewalls stand up to wear and tear; steel edges; sintered base is fast and low maintenance. Velvet Guru EC2 BTX artwork by Rex Ray. .
short_description: Loaded with pop and stability for aggressive riders, the GNU Velvet Guru EC2 BTX Snowboard will be your go-to choice for days spent exploring the entire mountain.
